task.title: Removing Users
task.shortdesc: If you wish to remove a user from your project, you can do so from the Project dashboard.

step.cmd: Check the box of the user you would like to remove.
At the bottom of the page click on Remove.

info.p: If you do not have a user checked you are taken to the Group overview page. You then have an option of selecting an user name to Remove at the bottom of that page.

step.cmd: You will be asked for confirmation before the user is removed.
